data.name: Innovation - The Need of the Hour
data.summary: The prime goal of this webinar is to make the participants understand what is the severity of the present conditions and what kind of problems that we are facing. How to look at the problem faced by a community / individual as an opportunity and the importance of innovation and participating in this kind of event. We aim at curating the problem statements themselves rather than working on the general problem statements provided. We believe that Ideas are our arsenal.
